package.name: point_cloud_io
package.description: Reading and writing point clouds from files. The reader node reads points and other data linked to a specified channel and publishes the cloud as sensor_msgs::PointCloud2. The writer subscribes to a cloud topic and receives sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 messanges and write them to files. To convert point cloud data a combination of the reader and writer can be used. Every channel can be inverted and multipled with a factor. In addition, the writer enables point cloud transformations to other frames with tf before writing the point cloud to a file.
package.author: Sebastian Pütz
